Get response variable from model

Source: R/modelling.R
response.Rd

Get response variable from model

response(object)

Arguments

object

lm or glm object

Examples

data(cars)
lm1 <- lm(dist ~ speed + I(speed^2), data=cars)
lm1 |> response() |> head()
#>  1  2  3  4  5  6 
#>  2 10  4 22 16 10 
cars <- cars |> add_pred(lm1)
cars |> head()
#>   speed dist      pred
#> 1     4    2  7.722637
#> 2     4   10  7.722637
#> 3     7    4 13.761157
#> 4     7   22 13.761157
#> 5     8   16 16.173834
#> 6     9   10 18.786430
cars <- cars |> add_resid(lm1)
cars 
#>    speed dist      pred       resid
#> 1      4    2  7.722637  -5.7226371
#> 2      4   10  7.722637   2.2773629
#> 3      7    4 13.761157  -9.7611569
#> 4      7   22 13.761157   8.2388431
